instructions: Toast the bread until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado on the toast.
Sprinkle chili flakes if desired.
Serve immediately.
Heat a skillet over medium heat.
Butter one side of each slice of bread.
Place one slice (butter side down) in the skillet and add cheese.
Cover with the second slice (butter side up).
Cook until golden brown on both sides.
Serve hot.
Season the chicken breast with hot sauce and grill it until fully cooked.
Toast the burger bun lightly.
Spread mayonnaise on the bottom bun.
Place the grilled chicken, lettuce, and tomato.
Cover with the top bun and serve.
Mash the banana in a bowl.
Mix in oats, milk, egg, baking powder, cinnamon, and honey.
Heat a non-stick pan and lightly grease it.
Pour small amounts of batter to form pancakes.
Cook for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown.
Serve warm with honey or fruit.

ingredients: Granola, coconut flakes, and fresh berries for topping
instructions: Blend the frozen berries, banana, yogurt, almond milk, and honey until smooth.
Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
Top with granola, coconut flakes, and fresh berries.
Serve immediately.
